name: Friday Night Funkin' - UGH Cover Mod
name_original: Friday Night Funkin' - UGH Cover Mod
description:
UGH! But it's a FNF Mod Cover! Your favorite characters such as Hex, Agoti, Spooky Kids, Tankman, Monika, and much more are all in this FNF UGH COVER MOD to sing UGH!  *DISCLAMER: This is NOT Supposed to be a WEEK 7 DOWNLOAD

TO DOWNLOAD: If the .exe does not open up, then copy the "mods" folder in put it into FNF Psych Engine. You can get Psych Engine from Game Banana: https://gamebanana.com/mods/309789 

Credits/Mods used :) : 

FNF Psych Engine Team: https://github.com/ShadowMario/FNF-PsychEngine

FNF Annie: https://gamebanana.com/mods/46918

FNF Agoti: https://gamebanana.com/mods/284934

FNF Hex: https://gamebanana.com/mods/44225

FNF Ruv: https://gamebanana.com/mods/44345

FNF Sarvente: https://gamebanana.com/mods/44345

FNF Selever: https://gamebanana.com/mods/44345

FNF Monika: https://gamebanana.com/mods/47364 

FNF Kapi: https://gamebanana.com/mods/44683

Check out the Friday Night Funkin here: https://ninja-muffin24.itch.io/funkin

Also check out Friday Night Funkin on Newgrounds: https://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/770371

Hope you enjoy the Cover Mod! Made with love! :)
